name: Falling down a hole
description:
You play as this ball guy(I really dont know what to call him) and he finds this Gigantic hole and a sign that Sugessts that there is money at the bottom of it, so he jumps in. While falling you need to dodge some Obstacles and at the End you need to get back up in a platforming segment.

the linux and mac versions are not testet in any kind of way so dont expect them to be good ports or something like that
